title: instant perma bans 0 warnings
body:
Hey riot and ppl, 
So, i just got perma banned w/o any warnings at all, i've never received a chat ban nor a suspension. I will be posting the chat later because I don't have LoL on this computer... Anyways, i'll admit I used some homophobic slurs yeah like twice lol. And was raging at our 0/37 kog "being toxic." My other account was perma banned and that one was WAY more toxic I went through all the chat bans to perma bans on that account even though one game I had 36 homophobic slurs but apparently the 2 I used rn were much worse. I would be happy if a rioter reviewed this case because an instant perma ban for this?? that is way too far.  Secondly, at the end of that game, it showed I got honours.  Riot games  should really check my logs again and in 2 years this is the first time I have been toxic lol and i get perma banned.. Yeah and i used barely any homophobic slurs

replies.body:
Logs or gtfo. You seem like entitled toxic waste.

Also evading bans with alts is worthy of an instant permban with no real warning.
Hey now, let's try to be civil about it whether you feel they are deserving of respect or not. All useful communication breaks down when we resort to insults.
You're allowed to make another account if you're permed tho
they don't even know until now i have another account because it's on a different email lol

Only time they care is for known people who have been permed indefinitely from making new accounts such as Tyler1 or Jensen. When Jensen was "unbanned" he only got the right to make new accounts again, as his older ones are still permed even today
who said i was evading bans with alts use ur mind "entitled toxic waste."
Guess people are just overly sensitive, this is what happens when you're raised to be a snowflake.
Personally, I think the people who believe they should be able to behave like an asshole without repercussions are acting like entitled children.
Sorry to break it to ya pal, but some people who go 0/36 deserves that. Btw, It's called telling the truth he was a troll, noob, and did ruin the game, anything wrong with telling the truth?

Hate to break it to ya pal, but the rules don't lift themselves because of what other people are doing. Riot judges your behavior and your behavior alone. They've held this stance for a long time.

If someone is trolling your game, you report them. Bitching at a troll is not helping the situation. Your teammates now have to put up with a troll **_and_** someone who's whining.
Nobody needs to watch some teenage brat have a tantrum. If it is not acceptable in society, it should not be acceptable on the internet when interacting with people you do not know.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-04-12T02:40:07.775+0000)
>
> Nobody needs to watch some teenage brat have a tantrum. If it is not acceptable in society, it should not be acceptable on the internet when interacting with people you do not know.

I'm called terrible things on a regular basis, you don't see me bitching.

There is a difference between "bitching" and not wanting time wasted by having to deal with inconsequential and obnoxious children. I vastly prefer the company of intelligent people (regardless of age) to some brat spamming "TR@SH F@Q DIE DIE KS".

Considering they are breaking the rules and of zero value to the community and society in general, they can be removed without anyone caring. I am mature enough not to care about looking "tough" to a bunch of kids. If they want to get banned, by all means let them.

You, however, are part of the problem. Clearly only you matter, and anyone can do whatever they want as long as it does not negatively impact you, personally.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2017-04-12T20:14:55.204+0000)
>
> There is a difference between "bitching" and not wanting time wasted by having to deal with inconsequential and obnoxious children. I vastly prefer the company of intelligent people (regardless of age) to some brat spamming "TR@SH F@Q DIE DIE KS".
> 
> Considering they are breaking the rules and of zero value to the community and society in general, they can be removed without anyone caring. I am mature enough not to care about looking "tough" to a bunch of kids. If they want to get banned, by all means let them.
> 
> You, however, are part of the problem. Clearly only you matter, and anyone can do whatever they want as long as it does not negatively impact you, personally.

Actually even when I'm insulted where it SHOULD bother me, I don't express any feelings towards it, if anything, insults are just another obstacle in life we need to overcome, it's not that I thin kit all revolves around me, I just choose to not let words ON A SCREEN get to me.

Hilarious, considering you are still crying over this inconsequential thread.
Go home, big boy.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000100000000000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-13T20:19:39.142+0000)
>
> Hilarious, considering you are still crying over this inconsequential thread.
> Go home, big boy.

Am I supposed to take you seriously? I'm conflicted.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T02:41:13.681+0000)
>
> I'm called terrible things on a regular basis, you don't see me bitching.

Well you are now. The kind of life you'll live is pretty sad, with that mentality you'll end up fostering a myriad of mental health disorders and just an overall inability to properly function in society.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T02:53:28.217+0000)
>
> Well you are now. The kind of life you'll live is pretty sad, with that mentality you'll end up fostering a myriad of mental health disorders and just an overall inability to properly function in society.

No, I choose to not let words get to me, what, you want me to act like a bitch over being called things like, "Homophobe" and so forth?

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:05:37.804+0000)
>
> No, I choose to not let words get to me, what, you want me to act like a bitch over being called things like, "Homophobe" and so forth?

"Act like a little bitch". You're the kind of guy that clubs people over the head thinking you're tough but actually hides under the covers every night because you're afraid of the dark. You seem like a dangerously unstable individual, and I would never want to meet you in real life.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:08:08.974+0000)
>
> "Act like a little bitch". You're the kind of guy that clubs people over the head thinking you're tough but actually hides under the covers every night because you're afraid of the dark. You seem like a dangerously unstable individual, and I would never want to meet you in real life.

Right....cause being strong mentally is a bad thing, it's just words a screen ffs

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:10:14.442+0000)
>
> Right....cause being strong mentally is a bad thing, it's just words a screen ffs

You could also apply that to anything that doesn't personally bother you. If you're not gay, then it doesn't bother you because you only care about yourself. I see.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:12:32.342+0000)
>
> You could also apply that to anything that doesn't personally bother you. If you're not gay, then it doesn't bother you because you only care about yourself. I see.

Am I supposed to be offended by words on a screen? I've been called things that I could get banned/muted for repeating, yet I'm not caring, because they don't know me, I don't know them, what's to get uptight over?

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:16:06.083+0000)
>
> Am I supposed to be offended by words on a screen? I've been called things that I could get banned/muted for repeating, yet I'm not caring, because they don't know me, I don't know them, what's to get uptight over?

Yes, but I'm sorry to break it to you, but the world doesn't revolve around you. I know it's probably going to come as a shock to you though, so take some time and think.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:18:56.652+0000)
>
> Yes, but I'm sorry to break it to you, but the world doesn't revolve around you. I know it's probably going to come as a shock to you though, so take some time and think.

I never thought it did, I'm just baffled people are offended by words ON A SCREEN.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:22:39.530+0000)
>
> I never thought it did, I'm just baffled people are offended by words ON A SCREEN.

Then why should anyone be offended over getting perma'd from LoL? It's just a game, totally fake.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000100000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:25:24.810+0000)
>
> Then why should anyone be offended over getting perma'd from LoL? It's just a game, totally fake.

Well let's see, "offended over getting perma-banned"? How does this sentence make any sense to begin with?

Also the fact someone possibly was on the verge of tears over a few words from someone they'll likely never see or speak to EVER again, is ridiculous.
Holy shit. You're retarded.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:38:59.050+0000)
>
> I'm just saddened by the fact that people have degenerated into a stone age caveman mentality.

So it's caveman mentality to not be phased by insults that hold no backbone whatsoever?

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/018/489/nick-young-confused-face-300x256_nqlyaa.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000004,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:48:12.859+0000)
>
> It's caveman mentality to defend those that choose to attack someone with the sole intent to disrupt and demean, yes.

What I'm saying is, "If you can't handle insults online, you have no business here then."

Plus contrary to popular belief, words DO NOT hurt as much as weapons,

Have a friend curse you out while you shoot yourself in the foot with a crossbow, which one hurts more?

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000003,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:43:05.644+0000)
>
> So it's caveman mentality to not be phased by insults that hold no backbone whatsoever?
> 
> http://i3.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/018/489/nick-young-confused-face-300x256_nqlyaa.jpg

It's caveman mentality to defend those that choose to attack someone with the sole intent to disrupt and demean, yes.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:31:17.765+0000)
>
> Being perma'd means the community and Riot doesn't want you around. Yea? Can you understand that? So many posts about how Riot is a shit company are decorating the boards every day. I wonder who's really getting offended.

At this rate, you.

You seem to become increasingly angry with each post you make,

"I'd hate to meet you IRL"

"You're going down a path to a sad life"

So I suggest you man up and accept the fact more people aren't as sensitive.

I had no idea that forum posts eventually reached a point in which replies stop being indented.
For someone who does not care, this guy sure is pathetically mad. I can but hope he matures enough to cope with the real world, before he gets kicked out of middle school for spending 4 days arguing with a teacher over semantics.

> [{quoted}](name=Carl Grimes TWD1,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000008,timestamp=2017-04-12T13:30:25.549+0000)
>
> Holy shit. You're retarded.

The fact you think being rude gets a point across is pathetic, you've got another thing coming.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000006,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:54:47.746+0000)
>
> Which pain lasts longer? Being told to kill myself by my own mother still is a memory I have to deal with for the rest of my life. I got punched in the face once and I hardly remember it.

There's a flaw in your comparison,

It's someone you care about that raised you from birth vs. a person you only hang around for 20-90 minutes.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000001,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:34:57.399+0000)
>
> At this rate, you.
> 
> You seem to become increasingly angry with each post you make,
> 
> "I'd hate to meet you IRL"
> 
> "You're going down a path to a sad life"
> 
> So I suggest you man up and accept the fact more people aren't as sensitive.

I'm just saddened by the fact that people have degenerated into a stone age caveman mentality.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T03:29:25.253+0000)
>
> Well let's see, "offended over getting perma-banned"? How does this sentence make any sense to begin with?
> 
> Also the fact someone possibly was on the verge of tears over a few words from someone they'll likely never see or speak to EVER again, is ridiculous.

Being perma'd means the community and Riot doesn't want you around. Yea? Can you understand that? So many posts about how Riot is a shit company are decorating the boards every day. I wonder who's really getting offended.
i have to agree with lyseth on this 1 ITS JUST WORDS LMAO

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-04-12T02:36:39.405+0000)
>
> Guess people are just overly sensitive, this is what happens when you're raised to be a snowflake.

Who is the snowflake though? He got soooo mad about a feeder. That's pretty snowflakey.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00010002,timestamp=2017-04-12T02:50:46.447+0000)
>
> Who is the snowflake though? He got soooo mad about a feeder. That's pretty snowflakey.

I mean as in if someone says "homophobic" (which in reality is just called Prejudice, stop making up words) slurs, people should learn to take a hit here and there.

When you are exposed to a consistently toxic community, 20-90 minutes becomes more than this. Sure 1 game of toxicity is no big deal, but being subjected to it every game is not building a healthy esteem, nor is it good for public image. The more the behavior is allowed, the more it seems to be justified, and thus, the community gets perpetually worse.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2017-04-12T04:03:54.237+0000)
>
> When you are exposed to a consistently toxic community, 20-90 minutes becomes more than this. Sure 1 game of toxicity is no big deal, but being subjected to it every game is not building a healthy esteem, nor is it good for public image. The more the behavior is allowed, the more it seems to be justified, and thus, the community gets perpetually worse.

There's a magical summoner spell called....chat mute.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-04-12T04:07:28.244+0000)
>
> There's a magical summoner spell called....chat mute.

There are other ways to be toxic besides just using words, which players often resort to when being ignored. Also, one should not forgo strategic conversation for fear of it turning sour.

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T04:31:05.119+0000)
>
> There are other ways to be toxic besides just using words, which players often resort to when being ignored. Also, one should not forgo strategic conversation for fear of it turning sour.

The moment they act up, just mute, simplicity at it's finest.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T05:18:11.668+0000)
>
> The moment they act up, just mute, simplicity at it's finest.

I'm not speaking for myself. Last game I was vs this really terrible teemo. He thought he was cool, trashtalking me and telling me I was trash, so I sat on him late game and won the game. If I were a hothead I would have run into him and died trying to kill him, but instead I bought some gear, got tanky, and won the game with only 2 deaths. He ended up like 2/9 or something. If I were a snowflake I would have ran at him and died like an idiot. :P

> [{quoted}](name=Anti Teemo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-12T05:31:50.387+0000)
>
> I'm not speaking for myself. Last game I was vs this really terrible teemo. He thought he was cool, trashtalking me and telling me I was trash, so I sat on him late game and won the game. If I were a hothead I would have run into him and died trying to kill him, but instead I bought some gear, got tanky, and won the game with only 2 deaths. He ended up like 2/9 or something. If I were a snowflake I would have ran at him and died like an idiot. :P

Actually no, that's still a bad comparison, I see toxic Teemo, Riven, Yasuo, Blitzcrank and Shaco all the time.

So if he was getting annoying in chat, mute, and move on, plus Teemo's countered by ANY champ who doesn't rely on autos, which there are quite a few.

> [{quoted}](name=Lyseth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=KH1JsHra,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2017-04-13T21:39:36.955+0000)
>
> Actually no, that's still a bad comparison, I see toxic Teemo, Riven, Yasuo, Blitzcrank and Shaco all the time.
> 
> So if he was getting annoying in chat, mute, and move on, plus Teemo's countered by ANY champ who doesn't rely on autos, which there are quite a few.

Bro, read my name man. I picked the Teemo match for fun.
The same thing happened to me. Now I'm bored af playing tf2
except I'm the least toxic person I know... Except for a few
People ignore the root cause of toxicity, which is matchmaking. When someone dies 8 times in lane for whatever reason it ruins the game and breeds toxicity. No one starts a game being an asshole
r u calling me an asshole?
